title: Nothing Wrong with More Variety ( Pastor Michael Todd Interview)
itunes:title: Nothing Wrong with More Variety ( Pastor Michael Todd Interview)
description:
Today on the show we had Pastor Michael Todd who spoke to us about his series "relationship goals", past cheating history, relationship growth and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to 2 Utah woman for their excuses for not wearing a mask and we opened up the phone lines to see if our woman listeners are opened to dating a bisexual man once news brok about Andrew Gillum.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
